掫字的基本解释

掫
zōu
巡夜打更：“宾将掫，主人辞。”
聚集。
成。
麻秆。
古地名，在今中国陕西省临潼县东北。
姓。

掫
zhōu
方言，从一侧或一端托起重物。

掫
chōu
拿取东西。

掫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zōu］
［《廣韻》側九切，上有，莊。］
［《廣韻》子于切，平虞，精。］
［《廣韻》子侯切，平侯，精。］
亦作“趣5”。
(1)巡夜打更；巡夜。
(2)聚集。参见“掫聚”。
(3)用同“菆”。麻秆。

掫字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　掫； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页439第11
【唐韻】子侯切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】將侯切，?音陬。【說文】夜戒守，有所擊也。【左傳·襄二十五年】陪臣干掫有淫者。【釋文】干音扞。又【昭二十年】賓將掫，主人辭。【註】掫，行夜也，卽今擊柝。　又地名。【後漢·更始傳】赤眉立劉盆子，更始使李松軍掫以拒之。【註】續漢志曰：新豐有掫城。　又【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?側九切，篘上聲。義同。持物相著也。　又【唐韻】子于切【集韻】遵須切，?音娵。擊也。　又【集韻】初尤切，音篘。手取物也。　又甾尤切，音鄒。持也。　又此苟切，陬上聲。亦擊也。　又【前漢·五行志】民驚走持藳，或掫一枚。【註】掫，麻幹也。○按木薪曰掫，麻蒸曰菆。或作黀。《韻會》謂黀通作掫，沿俗本之譌也。　【集韻】或作趣。

考證：〔【左傳·襄二十五年】陪臣干掫有淫者。【註】干音扞。〕　謹照原書註改釋文 。
掫字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
掫字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words

zōu
Watch the night watch: "The guest will be slapped, the master resigns."
Gather.
to make.
Hemp stalks.
Ancient place names, in the northeast of Lintong County, Shaanxi Province, China.
name.
grasp
zhōu
In dialect, lift heavy objects from one side or one end.
grasp

Take things.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zōu］
["Guangyun" nine cuts on the side, there is on the top, Zhuang. ]
["Guangyun" Zi Yuqie, Pingyu, Jing. ]
["Guang Yun" Zi Hou Qi, Ping Hou, Jing. ]
Also called "Fun 5".
(1) Patrolling the night; patrolling the night.
(2) Gathering. See "Pinch together".
(3) Use the same as "菆". Hemp stalks.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　掫; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 439 No. 11
[Tang Yun] Zi Hou Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Cut Hou,? Yin Zuo. [Said the text] The night guards, there is a hit. [Twenty-five Years of Zuo Zhuan·Xiang] Accompanying ministers do what they have to do with fornication. [Explanation] Qianyinjian. Also [20th year of Zhao] Bin will slap, and the master resigns. 【Note】Shoot, Xingyeye, 卽 hit Tua today.　Also place name. [Later Han·Gengshi Biography] Liu Penzi was erected with red eyebrows, and Li Songjun was beginning to squeeze him to resist. [Note] Continued Han Zhi said: Xinfeng has a city.　 [Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Nine cuts on the side, and the sound on the tape. The same meaning. Hold things together.　 [Tang Yun] Zi Yu Qi [Ji Yun] Zun must cut,? Yin 娵. Hit also.　[Jiyun] You cut at the beginning, and the sound is 篘. Hand fetching also.　You Zhe Youqi, Yin Zou. Hold also.　This is eager again, and the sound is on. Also hit also.　[Previous Han·Five Elements History] The people were shocked to go away and hold a lotus, or pick one. [Note] Chop, hemp dry. ○Press Muxin to say "pinch", and Ma steaming to say "Chu". Or cyanosis. "Yunhui" is said to be jingtong for 歫, along with the common version of 譌.　【Jiyun】Or make fun. Textual research: [[Zuo Zhuan·Xiang Twenty-five Years] Accompanying ministers intermittently engage in adultery. [Note] Qianyinjian. 〕 　 I would like to modify the interpretation according to the original note.

Name meaning
Nothing.
zōu
I гл.
1) * отбивать часы ночной стражи; ходить ночным дозором
2) * зажимать
掫囊 затянуть мешок
II сущ.
конопляная солома; хворостина
掫掫一枚 держать в руке хворостину
III собств.
1) ист., геогр. Цзоу (местность на террит. нынешней пров. Шэньси; дин. Хань)
2) Цзоу (фамилия)
